title: devbuyucoin
author: devbuyucoin
content: Join us for the Twitter Space on - Blockchain Careers - How to Start a Career in Web3BTC?The panel will be joined by👉 Lakshya Mittal 🧘 - CBDO, RECOREM👉 Ilya Lesik - CTO brainhubThe discussion will be hosted & moderated by Pradeep Damle, Marketing Manager - QuillAudits - Web3 Security 🛡️Agenda: ➡️What skills and knowledge are required for web3 jobs? ➡️What industries are most likely to hire for blockchain positions?➡️What are the most in-demand skills for blockchain jobs?➡️ What types of web3 jobs are available??..and much more!🗓: December 27, 2022⏳: 06:30 P.M ISTJoin: https://twitter.com/i/spaces/1lDxLneZzkbGm
